verses.text_plain: Or ever I was aware, my soul made me like the chariots of Amminadib.
verses.verse_html:
12Or ever I was aware, my soul made me like the chariots of Amminadib. ▼
▼ Or ever…: Heb. I knew not
 , ▼
▼ made…: or, set me on the chariots of my willing people

verses.text_plain: Return, return, O Shulamite; return, return, that we may look upon thee. What will ye see in the Shulamite? As it were the company of two armies.
verses.verse_html:
13Return, return, O Shulamite; return, return, that we may look upon thee. What will ye see in the Shulamite? As it were the company of two armies. ▼
▼ of…: or, of Mahanaim
